mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(0) AS casenum, stafinfo.stafname FROM caseinfo, stafinfo WHERE caseinfo.stafid = stafinfo.stafid AND caseinfo.casestate = 1 GROUP BY stafinfo.stafid
SELECT COUNT(0) as stafnum, deptinfo.deptname FROM stafinfo, deptinfo WHERE stafinfo.deptid = deptinfo.deptid GROUP BY deptinfo.deptid
SELECT COUNT(0) as drugnum, druginfo.drugname FROM druginfo, prescinfo where druginfo.drugid = prescinfo.drugid GROUP BY druginfo.drugid ORDER BY drugnum DESC

SELECT COUNT(0) AS mostcasenum, stafinfo.stafname FROM caseinfo, stafinfo, deptinfo WHERE caseinfo.stafid = stafinfo.stafid AND deptinfo.deptid = stafinfo.deptid AND caseinfo.casestate = 1 GROUP BY stafinfo.stafid, deptinfo.deptid ORDER BY mostcasenum DESC
